Text: Thanks...Cook Da Books, Torch Song, 3D, Bangah...all so good

Thanks so much for this great stuff!

Here's a tough one you might be able to answer. On CFNY during the 1980s and early '90s they used an instrumental track as a backdrop during all of their remote broadcasts--events and sponsor sales. Does anyone know what that piece of music was?
Thanks for this too.  The artwork for this era of music is so cool and unique hehehe.  I don't know of any of it to offend people like some of today's covers.

Hey 80zforever,

Was there a b-side to the Bangah track?  Love that song - would love to hear more from them!!

Thank you!!
